text: peanuts are planted in April and May growing about four months until harvest the peanut flower blooms above the ground but the peanut fruit develops below the ground a small stem called a peg reaches down from the flower to the soil this is where the peanut develops

the peanut flower blooms above the
ground but the peanut fruit develops
below the ground a small stem called a
peg reaches down from the flower to the
soil this is where the peanut develops
